comments.text:
There are people who unravel when they hear a baby crying. It is a natural 
response too.. A father hearing his baby cry wants to help it. This guy 
couldn't so he felt helpless and resorted to the only way he could think of 
to keep it quiet.
This happens a lot, so that is my theory. If it was actually what happened 
in this case, I don't know.

There are cases of parents who close the door to their baby's room because 
it is crying and let it starve because they can't handle the crying. My mom 
has been involved in having babies removed from their parents because the 
babies would've died if they had stayed. The family in question was already 
on their radar though because of prior problems.

I had an impossible discussion with a mom once who had had their kid 
removed. She adamantly claimed that social services remove children for 
almost reason. The facts however are that it is the most expensive way to 
deal with a case and that it puts emotional stress on everyone including 
the workers(like my mom) since the children in those cases are better off 
at home more than 90% of the time.
